name: 郭美純
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。
schedule:
Week 1   17/09－21/09		Orientation
Week 2   24/09－28/09		What a World – Reading Unit 1
		 	What a World – Listening Unit 1
Week 3   01/10－05/10	                   What a World – Reading Unit 1
                                                        What a World – Listening Unit 1
Week 4   08/10－12/10 		What a World – Reading Unit 2
                                                        What a World – Listening Unit 2
Week 5   15/10－19/10		What a World – Reading Unit 2
                                                        What a World – Listening Unit 2
Week 6   22/10－26/10                      What a World – Reading Unit 3
                                                        What a World – Listening Unit 3
Week 7   29/10－02/11		What a World – Reading Unit 3
			What a World – Listening Unit 3
Week 8   05/11－09/11		Review Unit 1~3
Week 9   12/11－16/11                     Mid-term Exam Week
13/11			Mid-Term English Proficiency Exam
Week 10  19/11－23/11                    What a World Reading Unit 4
                                                        What a World Listening Unit 4
Week 11  26/11－30/11		What a World Reading Unit 4
                                                        What a World Listening Unit 4
Week 12  03/12－07/12		What a World Reading Unit 5
                                                        What a World Listening Unit 5
Week 13 	 10/12－14/12	What a World Reading Unit 5
                                                        What a World Listening Unit 5
Week 14  17/12－21/12		What a World Reading Unit 7
                                                        What a World Listening Unit 7
Week 15  24/12－28/12		What a World Reading Unit 7
                                                        What a World Listening Unit 7
Week 16  31/12－04/01		Review Unit 4, Unit 5 & Unit 7
Week 17  07/01－11/01		Term Review
Week 18  14/01－18/01                    Final Exam Week
15/01			Final English Proficiency Exam
scorePolicy:
A:正規課程(167635)+輔導課程(169700) (60%)
	-	期中成績30% (課文、聽力與寫作)
	-	期末成績30% (課文、聽力與寫作)
	-	出缺席率20%
	-	課堂表現20% (小考、口說練習、討論、作業等)
B: Oral Presentation 10%
C:期中英文會考15% 
D:期末英文會考15%
E: Others (額外加分、參與校內外英語活動比賽)
PS. 期中考試、期末考試必到；課堂考試。
